/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the highway, giving a driver's view of the surroundings. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The highway itself is surrounded by lush greenery, with trees and mountains stretching out on either side. A few cars can be seen sharing the road with a bus, adding a sense of movement to the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the grandeur of the landscape and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and grass contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
